casebody.data:
Michael SWIFT, Employee, Plaintiff
v.
RICHARDSON SPORTS, LTD. d/b/a Carolina Panthers, Employer and
Legion Insurance Company (Cameron M. Harris & Company, Adjusting Service), Carriers, Defendants. No. 598P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. R. James Lore, Raleigh, for Michael Swift. Shannon P. Metcalf, Hatcher B. Kincheloe, Charlotte, for Richardson Sports, et al. Prior report: 173 N.C.App. 134 , 620 S.E.2d 533 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 26th day of October 2005 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th day of June 2006."

TIMMONS-GOODSON, J. recused.
